page.title: 19 A day in the life of Colin
page.content: I get up at 8 o'clock and have breakfast.Then I get dressed and have a wash.I normally have cornflakes for breakfast and a glass of milk.Then I pack my bag for school.I put my lunch box and my flask in it and make sure that I have got my reading book.I go to school at 8.45.School starts at 9.00. First of all there is an assembly.After assembly we normally do some number work.During the morning we do some language work.I like this best of all. School dinner is from 12.00-1,15.In the afternoon we have games or art or needlework.School ends at 3.30.All of the children go home at the same time. When I get home I like to watch t.v.for a while.Sometimes I have homework to do.I normally go to bed at 9.00.Ilike going to school,I'm looking forward to going to the middle school.
